m_szDocTitle: Markets Live: CBA hits next record high
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Markets Live: CBA hits next record high Date Read later The Australian share market recovered from a heavy fall at the open to post a modest gain. Sort comments by: No new comments Forbe's richest 100 don't short the market. No, they get their hedge funds to do it for them. Forbe's recommend it: http://www.forbes.com/sites/investopedia/2013/09/24/when-to-short-a-stock/ Date and time November 06, 2013, 4:39PM Woo hoo...Napoleon's been here today alright with about fifty posts. Not even the EDs could keep up with that....well done genius. Commenter Date and time
